name: Platinum Hackerman
description:
Can you hack the Amazoom mainframe?

Controls:
W, A, S, D -                   Move around in cyberspace.
Left Mouse Button -    Shoot enemies with your Gun. 
Right Mouse Button -  Trap rival agents within Hacker Goo. 

The Hacker Goo will make the enemies share damage taken. However, some enemies may use this goo to combine and become stronger.
